question_text.en: The population of a village is 12960. 7/12 of them are males and the rest are females. 45% of males are married. All marriages are monogamous and people have spouse living with them. What percentage of women are married?

trick_application: Married population = Total x % of married people.
Number of males married = Number of females married

text.en: The population of a village is 12960. 7/12 of them are males and the rest are females. 45% of males are married. All marriages are monogamous and people have spouse living with them. What percentage of women are married?
